titles.title: To repeal the wool and mohair subsidy provided in the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Horticulture.

bill.summary: 5/3/2001--Introduced. Amends the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Appropriations Act, 2001 to repeal the wool and mohair subsidy.
